title: Sound On: Mask Mandates and Disney vs. Florida
itunes:title: Sound On: Mask Mandates and Disney vs. Florida
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.
Guests: Speaker of the Florida House of Representatives Chris Sprowls, Dr. Jay Varma and Bloomberg politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
